name: Community Tags
author: Rob Sawyer

sections.description: Community Tags is useful if you would like the community to be able to add tags to your posts. This is particularly useful for photos. Once a user adds a tag the tag is held in a proposed tags array and held for moderation.
sections.installation:
e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php $post_id = the_ID(); <div id="tagthis-$post_id" class="tagthis" style="display:none"></div> ?> in your post loop.
sections.faq:
Can I moderate the tags?

Yes, currently the plugin requires that you moderate the tags.

short_description: This plugin was extended from Matt's Community Tags and it allows the community to add tags to your posts. The tags should be added with commas a …
